mil.emp3.api

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Container
      • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Feature<IGeoPoint>
        • mil.emp3.api.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer, IFeature<IGeoPoint>, IGeoAltitudeMode, IGeoBase, IGeoContainer, IGeoPoint, IGeoPositionGroup, IGeoRenderable

    public class Point
extends Feature<IGeoPoint>
implements IGeoPoint
    This class implements the Point feature that encapsulates a GeoPoint object.

        this is the default constructor.

      • Point

        public Point(java.lang.String sURL)
        This constructor creates a Point feature wherer the icon is accessed via the URL provided. The caller must provide the GeoIconStyle to correctly position the icon.
        Parameters:
        sURL - A valid URL

      • setIconURI

        public void setIconURI(java.lang.String sURL)
        This method set the image URL of a point feature. It will override the default icon.
        Specified by:
        setIconURI in interface IGeoPoint
        Parameters:
        sURL - The URL of the image.

      • setIconScale

        public void setIconScale(double dScale)
        This method sets the icon scale. The size of the icon will be modified by this factor when rendered.
        Parameters:
        dScale - A value smaller than 1.0 decreases the size. A value larger than 1.0 increases the size.

      • getIconScale

        public double getIconScale()
        This method returns the scale value.
        Returns:

      • setResourceId

        public void setResourceId(int resId)
        This method is an ANDROID ONLY method. It allows the developer to us an android drawable resource as an icon for a Point feature. The resource must be accessible to the EMP Core. If a resource Id is set the icon style offset is interpreted as a fraction.
        Parameters:
        resId - The resource ID of the resource.

      • getResourceId

        public int getResourceId()
        This method is an ANDROID ONLY method. It returns the resource Id.
        Returns:
        The resojurce Id or 0 if one has not been set.
